alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Central Black Hills; Custer County Plains; Eastern Foot Hills; Mellette and Todd Counties; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills; Tripp County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 22 at 2:11PM MDT until October 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY ACROSS NORTHEAST WYOMING...THE BLACK HILLS...AND SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA... .Gusty southwesterly winds with humidity values dropping into the teens and dry fuels will produce critical fire weather conditions this afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 316, 318, 319, 320, 321, 324, 325, 332, 333, 334, AND 335... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 316 Crook County Plains, 318 Wyoming Black Hills, 319 Northern Black Hills, 320 Central Black Hills, 321 Southern Black Hills, 324 Eastern Foot Hills, 325 Custer County Plains, 332 Badlands Area, 333 Bennett County Area, 334 Mellette and Todd Counties and 335 Tripp County. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity will produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Central Black Hills; Custer County Plains; Eastern Foot Hills; Mellette and Todd Counties; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills; Tripp County
